name: The Bone
text:
{T}: Put a counter on this.
($) Remove 1 counter from this: Add 1 to a roll.
($) Remove 2 counters from this: Deal 1 damage to a monster or a player.
($) Remove 5 counters from this: This becomes a soul and loses all abilities.
